properties.name: spring.async.enabled
properties.description: It defines if Async support will be enabled or not.

properties.name: spring.async.initial-pool-size
properties.description: Set the ThreadPoolExecutor's initial pool size. Default is 5.

properties.name: spring.async.max-pool-size
properties.description: Set the ThreadPoolExecutor's maximum pool size. Default is 10.

properties.name: spring.async.queue-pool-size
properties.description: Set the capacity for the ThreadPoolExecutor's BlockingQueue. Default is 25.

properties.name: spring.async.task-timeout
properties.description: Specify the amount of time, in milliseconds, before asynchronous request handling times out. Default is 30000.
